idea-plugin.name: Code Element Sorter
idea-plugin.description:
Usage: Right-click menu, select "Sort Members A-Z"

  • Intelligent Sorting: Intelligent sorting of variables and methods in the current page, supporting both full-page sorting and selected region sorting modes.
  • Multi-layer Inner Class Support: Recursively sorts multi-layer inner classes up to 3 levels deep.
  • Group-based Sorting: Sorts elements into groups: static fields → instance fields → methods → inner classes.
  • Custom Spacing Rules: Preserves single blank line between element groups, adds blank lines after elements with Javadoc annotations.
  • Flexible Operation Modes: Supports full file sorting and selected partial sorting based on user selection.

使用方法：鼠标右键点击菜单，选择“Sort Members A-Z”

  • 智能排序：智能排序当前页面中的变量和方法，支持全页排序和选定区域排序两种模式。
  • 多层内部类支持：递归排序多层内部类，最多支持3层深度。
  • 分组排序：将元素按组排序：静态字段 → 实例字段 → 方法 → 内部类。
  • 自定义间距规则：保留元素组之间的单个空行，在带有Javadoc注解的元素后添加空行。
  • 灵活的操作模式：根据用户选择支持全文件排序和选定部分排序。

action.description: Sort all or selected variables and methods based on user selection
